CSI API ETABS v1

cDStAISC360_16SetPreference Method

Sets the value of a steel design preference item.

Namespace:  ETABSv1
Assembly:  ETABSv1 (in ETABSv1.dll) Version: 1.0.0.0 (2.3.0.0)
Syntax

C++

	int Item,

)
Function SetPreference (
	Item As Integer,
	Value As Double
) As Integer

Dim instance As cDStAISC360_16
Dim Item As Integer
Dim Value As Double
Dim returnValue As Integer

returnValue = instance.SetPreference(Item,
	Value)
int SetPreference(
	int Item,
	double Value
)
abstract SetPreference :
        Item : int *
        Value : float -> int

Parameters

Item
Type: SystemInt32
This is an integer between 2 and 54, inclusive, indicating the preference item considered.
  1. Multi-Response Case Design
  2. Framing Type
  3. Seismic Design Category
  4. Importance Factor I
  5. Design System Rho
  6. Design System Sds
  7. Design System R
  8. Design System Omega0
  9. Design System Cd
  10. Design Provision
  11. Analysis Method
  12. Second Order Method
  13. Stiffness Reduction Method
  14. Add notional load cases into seismic combos?
  15. BRB Beta Factor
  16. BRB BetaOmega Factor
  17. Phi (Bending)
  18. Phi (Compression)
  19. Phi (Tension-Yielding)
  20. Phi (Tension-Fracture)
  21. Phi (Shear)
  22. Phi (Shear-Short Webbed Rolled I)
  23. Phi (Torsion)
  24. Ignore Seismic Code?
  25. Ignore Special Seismic Load?
  26. Is Doubler Plate Plug-Welded?
  27. HSS Welding Type
  28. Reduce HSS Thickness?
  29. Consider Deflection?
  30. DL deflection limit, L/Value
  31. SDL + LL deflection limit, L/Value
  32. LL deflection limit, L/Value
  33. Total load deflection limit, L/Value
  34. Total load deflection minus camber limit, L/Value
  35. Pattern Live Load Factor
  36. Demand/Capacity Ratio Limit
  37. Max Number of Auto Iterations
  1. Omega (Bending)
  2. Omega (Compression)
  3. Omega (Tension-Yielding)
  4. Omega (Tension-Fracture)
  5. Omega (Shear)
  6. Omega (Shear-Short Webbed Rolled I)
  7. Omega (Torsion)
Value
Type: SystemDouble
The value of the considered preference item.
  1. Multi-Response Case Design
    • 1 = Envelopes
    • 2 = Step-by-step
    • 3 = Last step
    • 4 = Envelopes -- All
    • 5 = Step-by-step -- All
  2. Framing Type
    • 1 = SMF
    • 2 = IMF
    • 3 = OMF
    • 4 = SCBF
    • 5 = OCBF
    • 6 = OCBFI
    • 7 = EBF
    • 8 = BRBF
  3. Seismic Design Category
    • 1 = A
    • 2 = B
    • 3 = C
    • 4 = D
    • 5 = E
    • 6 = F
  4. Importance Factor I

    Value > 0

  5. Design System Rho

    Value > 0

  6. Design System Sds

    Value > 0

  7. Design System R

    Value > 0

  8. Design System Omega0

    Value > 0

  9. Design System Cd

    Value > 0

  10. Design provision
    • 1 = LRFD
    • 2 = ASD
  11. Analysis Method
    • 1 = Direct Analysis
    • 2 = Effective Length
    • 3 = Limited 1st Order
  12. Second Order Method
    • 1 = General 2nd Order
    • 2 = Amplified 1st Order
  13. Stiffness Reduction Method
    • 1 = Tau-b variable
    • 2 = Tau-b Fixed
    • 3 = No Modification
  14. Add notional load cases into seismic combos?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  15. BRB Beta Factor

    Value > 0

  16. BRB BetaOmega Factor

    Value > 0

  17. Phi (Bending)

    Value > 0

  18. Phi (Compression)

    Value > 0

  19. Phi (Tension-Yielding)

    Value > 0

  20. Phi (Tension-Fracture)

    Value > 0

  21. Phi (Shear)

    Value > 0

  22. Phi (Shear-Short Webbed Rolled I)

    Value > 0

  23. Phi (Torsion)

    Value > 0

  24. Ignore Seismic Code?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  25. Ignore Special Seismic Load?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  26. Is Doubler Plate Plug-Welded?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  27. HSS Welding Type
    • 1 = ERW
    • 2 = SAW
  28. Reduce HSS Thickness?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  29. Consider Deflection?

    0 = No

    Any other value = Yes

  30. DL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  31. SDL + LL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  32. LL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  33. Total load deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  34. Total load deflection minus camber limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  35. Pattern Live Load Factor

    Value > 0

  36. Demand/Capacity Ratio Limit

    Value > 0

  37. Max Number of Auto Iterations

    Value > 0

  1. Omega (Bending)

    Value > 0

  2. Omega (Compression)

    Value > 0

  3. Omega (Tension-Yielding)

    Value > 0

  4. Omega (Tension-Fracture)

    Value > 0

  5. Omega (Shear)

    Value > 0

  6. Omega (Shear-Short Webbed Rolled I)

    Value > 0

  7. Omega (Torsion)

    Value > 0

Return Value

Type: Int32
Returns zero if the item is successfully set; otherwise it returns a nonzero value.
Remarks
Examples
VB
Copy
Public Sub Example()
   Dim SapModel As cSapModel
   Dim EtabsObject As cOAPI
   Dim ret As Integer = -1
   Dim Value As Double

'create ETABS object
   Dim myHelper as cHelper = New Helper
   EtabsObject = myHelper.CreateObjectProgID("CSI.ETABS.API.ETABSObject")

'start ETABS application
  ret = EtabsObject.ApplicationStart()

'create SapModel object
   SapModel = EtabsObject.SapModel

'initialize model
   ret = SapModel.InitializeNewModel()

'create steel deck template model
   ret = SapModel.File.NewSteelDeck(4, 12, 12, 4, 4, 24, 24)

'set steel design code
   ret = SapModel.DesignSteel.SetCode("AISC 360-16")

'set preference item
   ret = SapModel.DesignSteel.AISC360_16.SetPreference(2, 2)

'close ETABS
   EtabsObject.ApplicationExit(False)

'clean up variables
   SapModel = Nothing
   EtabsObject = Nothing

End Sub
